channel.title: How to play minecraft without JAVA (in ur c:/) and to make it portale! woooot =)
channel.description:
hi moparcraft ;)
today i will be making a tutorial on how to play minecraft without java so u can play on a school computer (like me) to make it portable (wooooot!) and what ever you want to do with it!
ok first of all you need to download winrar, 7zip, winzip (i use winrar)
Winrar [url=http://www.rarlab.com]www.rarlab.com[/url] 7zip [url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]http://www.7-zip.org/download.html[/url] winzip (google it lol sorry cbf finding it)
ok now download these file's:
The minecraft.exe [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12527604/projects/minecraft/minecraft_portable/release/2.6_final/MinecraftPortable2.6.zip[]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12527604/projects/minecraft/minecraft_portable/release/2.6_final/MinecraftPortable2.6.zip[/url] the Java Binaries [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12527604/projects/minecraft/minecraft_portable/release/JavaPortable.zipk]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12527604/projects/minecraft/minecraft_portable/release/JavaPortable.zip[/url] The .minecraft file's (to play offline! and has mod's (press E for everything)) [url=http://on its way!]on its way![/url] Uploaded with dropbox.com and my website filehosterz.tk
[font=verdana][size=18pt]Installing it![/size][/font]
1. ok first make a folder called minecraft 2. extract the minecraft.exe 3. run it and u should see a new file be created 4. now open up the Java Binary files and extract it to the new file that was made 5. now go on and login!! (if u want to play off line then extract the .minecraft files from above into the new file created!) 6. enjoy!
How to Make it portable!
1. put the minecraft file into your usb or hdd 2. start and play!!
Video's! [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oWUewnTj6K4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oWUewnTj6K4[/url] [url=http://(coming soon)](coming soon)[/url]
Comment, (rep if u want!), and DONT TROLL :)!

item.title: How to play minecraft without JAVA (in ur c:/) and to make it portale! woooot =)
item.dc:creator: @spooty spooty
item.description:
@spooty wrote:

[size=14pt]Thanks for this! works great.[/size]

[size=12pt]Just to clear things up, my school computers do not come with Java. I know this for a fact, because i’m part of my schools tech support and we ghost the computers. and I know for a fact they’re ghosted without any form of java. [/size]

Read full topic

item.title: How to play minecraft without JAVA (in ur c:/) and to make it portale! woooot =)
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

it is most def using java. if ur school computers are windows xp pro(idk all the OSes that come like this) then a jre is installed during installation(if this isnt true im sorry thats just what i know from experience. i say a jre folder somewhere in the windows sub directory system), its not up to date obviously. just b/c the file extension says exe doesnt mean anything. exe is generic extension for executible applications. it can be java wrapped in some executible program or what ever. i know of a few programs that do similar things i just cant remember what they are called, for some reason i think one is something like pup… i wish my memory was better…

Read full topic
